Available Balance

Change Account Group

Available Balance

Available balance is the most current record we have about the funds that are available for withdrawal from your account.

Available balance includes most “pending” transactions, such as deposits made during the day (cash or transfers) that are available for immediate withdrawal and pending withdrawals such as Bill Pay and debit card transactions that have been authorized (but not yet paid from your account).

Available balance does not reflect outstanding checks, automatic bill payments that you have authorized, or certain debit card transactions that have been authorized by the Bank but not yet submitted for payment by the merchant, or that have never been submitted for authorization.

  • Personal Accounts
  • Business Accounts
